body:
**BUG REPORT**:
/kind bug

**What happened**:
Arguments to a command inside pod are treated as kubectl flags and deprecation warnings are shown for them from `flags.go`.

**What you expected to happen**:
Arguments to a command inside pod should not be treated as kubectl flags by `flags.go`.

**How to reproduce it**:
```
$ kubectl run ubuntu --image=ubuntu -- echo --some_arg1 --some_arg2 --some_arg3 --some_arg4
W0314 12:36:29.338725   26127 flags.go:39] some_arg1 is DEPRECATED and will be removed in a future version. Use some-arg1 instead.
W0314 12:36:29.338858   26127 flags.go:39] some_arg2 is DEPRECATED and will be removed in a future version. Use some-arg2 instead.
W0314 12:36:29.338864   26127 flags.go:39] some_arg3 is DEPRECATED and will be removed in a future version. Use some-arg3 instead.
W0314 12:36:29.338868   26127 flags.go:39] some_arg4 is DEPRECATED and will be removed in a future version. Use some-arg4 instead.
W0314 12:36:29.338946   26127 flags.go:39] some_arg1 is DEPRECATED and will be removed in a future version. Use some-arg1 instead.
W0314 12:36:29.338960   26127 flags.go:39] some_arg2 is DEPRECATED and will be removed in a future version. Use some-arg2 instead.
W0314 12:36:29.338964   26127 flags.go:39] some_arg3 is DEPRECATED and will be removed in a future version. Use some-arg3 instead.
W0314 12:36:29.338970   26127 flags.go:39] some_arg4 is DEPRECATED and will be removed in a future version. Use some-arg4 instead.
W0314 12:36:29.338990   26127 flags.go:39] some_arg1 is DEPRECATED and will be removed in a future version. Use some-arg1 instead.
W0314 12:36:29.339000   26127 flags.go:39] some_arg2 is DEPRECATED and will be removed in a future version. Use some-arg2 instead.
W0314 12:36:29.339004   26127 flags.go:39] some_arg3 is DEPRECATED and will be removed in a future version. Use some-arg3 instead.
W0314 12:36:29.339010   26127 flags.go:39] some_arg4 is DEPRECATED and will be removed in a future version. Use some-arg4 instead.
deployment "ubuntu" created
```

The arguments `--some_arg1`, `--some_arg2`, `--some_arg3`, `--some_arg4` passed to the command `echo` inside the `ubuntu` pod above are treated as `kubectl` flags and deprecation warnings are shown for them from `flags.go`.

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version:
1.9:
```
$ kubectl version
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"9", GitVersion:"v1.9.3", GitCommit:"d2835416544f298c919e2ead3be3d0864b52323b", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-02-07T12:22:21Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.2", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"", Minor:"", GitVersion:"v1.9.0", GitCommit:"925c127ec6b946659ad0fd596fa959be43f0cc05", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-01-26T19:04:38Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.1", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```

- Cloud provider or hardware configuration:
Ubuntu Xenial VM.

- OS:
```
$ cat /etc/os-release
NAME="Ubuntu"
VERSION="16.04.4 LTS (Xenial Xerus)"
ID=ubuntu
ID_LIKE=debian
PRETTY_NAME="Ubuntu 16.04.4 LTS"
VERSION_ID="16.04"
HOME_URL="http://www.ubuntu.com/"
SUPPORT_URL="http://help.ubuntu.com/"
BUG_REPORT_URL="http://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/"
VERSION_CODENAME=xenial
UBUNTU_CODENAME=xenial
```
- Kernel:
```
$ uname -a
Linux vhosakot-ccp-dev 4.4.0-116-generic #140-Ubuntu SMP Mon Feb 12 21:23:04 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```
- Install tools:
minikube:
```
$ minikube version
minikube version: v0.25.0
```

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG CLI.

title: Arguments to a command inside pod are treated as kubectl flags and deprecation warnings are shown for them
